summary: A prehistoric behemoth is unwittingly awaken from hibernation due to a U.S-Japanese military experiment on it's watery lair for economic means, where it proceeds in attacking Japan.
cast: Myron Healey|Tsuruko Kobayashi|Clifford Kawada|Derick Shimatsu|Kôzô Nomura|Ayumi Sonoda|Fumindo Matsuo|Hiroshi Hisasume|Yoneo Iguchi|Hideo Inamura|Roy K. director: Directors: Jerry A. Baerwitz, Ishirô Honda (uncredited) | 1 more credit »
title: Varan the Unbelievable
